Texts.Eng: Makhan gave you the schematics for that Bone Crossbow, I guess? He means well, but his bone weaponry is simply outdated. I have the ^orange;blueprints for an improved crossbow^white;, but I can't give them away for free. I need some ^orange;Thelean Metal ^white;for my research - ^green;find me a piece, and the blueprints are yours^white;.
Thank you, Captain. With this metal fragment, I can finally finish my research! Perhaps I'll have need of you again soon... Either way, here are the blueprints I promised you. Put them to good use.
